author: Daniel Shen
comment: The background should be replaced by a HIGH quality one.  For example, default Blue MoonPhase face for huawei watch has a very high quality background.

author: Chris Day
comment: This is a super looking watch face and light on battery. To get 5 stars I would like to see dual (watch and phone) battery displays on the battery circle dial (see the new skymaster face) and why have a second hand AND a dial that shows seconds? An option to remove the liongate text and just keep the icon would be welcomed
title: Great looking but mini dials are wasted

author: Ujjwal Sehgal
comment: Great design but the analogue ambient mode is either to simple or has too much. Needs a a mode in between. There full mode will eat through battery as it has a blue background on an amoled screen.
title: Nice design

author: Grayson Carr
comment: Like many of this devs faces, it is not centered on the Moto 360. Needs to be moved a couple pixels to the right (not sure exactly how many).
title: Good

author: Plamen Panayotov
comment: One of most beautiful watch faces!
title: Nice, very nice app
